# Generated by Bashgen

bashgen() {
    local CURDIR=$(pwd);
    cd ~/Projects/bashGen;
    if [ $# -eq 1 ]
        then
            vim config.json;
    fi
    node bashgen.js;
    mv bash_profile ~/.bash_profile;
    source ~/.bash_profile;
    cp confs/tmux.conf ~/.tmux.conf;
    cp confs/vimrc ~/.vimrc;
    sudo cp confs/powerline_tmux.json /usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/powerline/config_files/themes/tmux/default.json;
    cd $CURDIR;
}
